title: Burning Spear - Man in the Hills & Marcus Garvey TQMP
description:
Since there are no covers included this is not a genuine TQMP release.

But a good friend of mine insisted I'd upload this one for all rastafarians out there, so here it is: 2 Albums from the great Burning Spear. 

You can burn this selection on 1 CD

CD: Burning Spear - Man in the Hills & Marcus Garvey

From the "Man in the Hills" Album:

01. Man In The Hills
02. It's Good
03. No More War
04. Black Soul
05. Lion
06. People Get Ready
07. Children
08. Mother
09. Door Deep
10. Groovy

From the Marcus Garvey Album:

11. Marcus Garvey
12. Slavery Days
13. Invasion
14. Live Good
15. Give Me
16. Old Marcus Garvey
17. Tradition
18. Jordan River
19. Red, Gold, Green
20. Resting Place


Greetings in the Name of the Lord! Jah! Rastafari!
